target.name: help
target.description: Print additional usage instructions.
target.echo: Main targets:
html Builds standalone HTML files.
dirhtml Builds HTML files named index.html in directories.
singlehtml Builds a single large HTML file.
pickle Builds pickle files.
json Builds JSON files.
htmlhelp Builds HTML files and a HTML help project.
qthelp Builds HTML files and a qthelp project.
devhelp Builds HTML files and a Devhelp project.
epub Builds an epub.
latex Builds LaTeX files, you can set paper=a4 or paper=letter.
latexpdf Builds LaTeX files and run them through pdflatex.
text Builds text files.
man Builds manual pages.
texinfo Builds Texinfo files.
info Builds Texinfo files and run them through makeinfo.
gettext Builds PO message catalogs.
changes Builds an overview of all changed/added/deprecated items.
linkcheck Checks all external links for integrity.
doctest Runs all doctests embedded in the documentation (if enabled).
Build artifacts are created within the "build" directory.
You can set the following properties:
sphinxbuild Absolute path to sphinx-build executable.
sphinxopts Sphinx-build options override (default is -nW).
builddir Build directory location.
paper Paper size for LaTeX (supported sizes: a4, letter).

target.name: qthelp

# assistant -collectionFile ${builddir}/qthelp/TheOroPlatform.qhc

target.name: devhelp

# mkdir -p $$HOME/.local/share/devhelp/TheOroPlatform
# ln -s ${builddir}/devhelp $$HOME/.local/share/devhelp/TheOroPlatform
